navigableData.title: Hello World
navigableData.about: My name is Nick Malozzi, and I ❤️ building interfaces. As a Front End Developer & Manager with experience in UX, Web & Graphic Design, I'm uniquely suited to work closely with Design and/or Product Teams. I am currently seeking new full time opportunities. So please get in touch!

jobs.name: malozzi.codes LLC
jobs.description:
Operates as my independent contracting venture, prioritizing projects that align closely with my core expertise: crafting visually captivating, responsive, and streamlined frontend interfaces.
Collaborate with diverse clients, leveraging a wide range of technologies to deliver exceptional frontend solutions.

jobs.name: TN Marketing
jobs.description: Spearheaded front end initiatives for a dynamic eCommerce platform catering to 14 distinct brands/sites. Orchestrated and contributed to the migration from a conventional PHP/JQuery-driven Wordpress architecture to an independent front end, built with Laravel, Blade templates, Livewire, and AlpineJS. Was a core contributor to the development of Cypress end-to-end tests that supported the migration. Managed a team of remote front end developers across multiple time zones, overseeing task allocation, scoping, and scheduling work. Collaborated closely with the UX team to ensure technical feasibility, and adherence to ADA compliance standards. Also built and supported multiple micro front ends built in React.

jobs.name: Bluprint/Craftsy
jobs.jobTitle: FE UI Engineer & Sr. UX Engineer
jobs.description: Played integral roles in both UX and development aspects across various projects, transitioning from UX Engineer to Senior UX Engineer and eventually focusing on Front End UI Engineering. Contributed to diverse Front End stacks, encompassing an e-commerce platform in React, a React Native mobile app, a Video Player Library utilizing Preact/React/JS, and a CMS in Handlebars/JS. Actively participated in re-branding and rebuilding initiatives. Collaborated closely with Product teams, involving wire-framing, user testing, mockups creation, and HTML/CSS development for new features.

jobs.name: Echostar
jobs.description: Was the primary UI/UX Designer for dishanywhere.com, Dish Network's streaming service. Also contributed to the Front End coding efforts needed to launch the site.

jobs.name: On-Site.com
jobs.description: Designed and coded a template system for the On-Site Marketing platform for apartment complexes. As well as redesigned the UI/UX for said platform's administration interface.

jobs.name: Resort Destination Marketingvvvvv
jobs.description: Designed and coded vacation rental website's for the ski industry.

jobs.name: Sposto Interactive
jobs.description: Web Design Internship setup through my college.

jobs.name: Airhead Misfits
jobs.description: Operates as a Doing Business As (DBA) entity under malozzi.codes, LLC, serving as a platform to support the vintage BMW Airhead motorcycle community. Utilizing Airhead Misfits as a creative outlet to explore and enhance skills in social media marketing, Shopify platform management, and production of print media including stickers, t-shirts, and other merchandise. Engaged in early-stage development of video-based podcast production and editing in collaboration with the established Airhead247 Podcast. After having launched the Airhead247 Podcast website in early 2024.

jobs.name: Savage Orchid Racing
jobs.description: Co-founded and management of Savage Orchid Racing, a 501(c)(7) not-for-profit racing club, alongside three former colleagues from the Craftsy technology team. Lead the creative direction by generating all visual assets including car liveries, logos, branding, and thematic elements. Oversee the maintenance, modification, and construction of a fleet of three cars. Assist in the coordination, strategy, and logistics for a team of about 10 drivers/crew. Regularly compete in the 24 Hours of Lemons racing series, two-time recipients of the Best Theme award and consistently placing within the top 10 in class.

schools.name: Kutztown University
schools.description: Concentrations in Interactive(Web) & Graphic Design. President of the Outdoors Club.

schools.name: Liberty High School
schools.description: Graduated with honors. President of FBLA, President of the Ski Club, Assistant Captain of the Ice Hockey Team.
